name: Mammon Tiefling
description: These tieflings bear the mark of Mammon, the archdevil of avarice and the ruler of Minauros.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Hellish Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Legacy of Minauros
traits.description: You know the Mage Hand cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast Tenser's Floating Disk once. At 5th level, you can cast Arcane Lock once. You must finish a long rest to cast these spells again with this trait.
